name: 记忆重构/Memories
detailed_description:
Memories is a live-action escape room movie game. The live-action, intensive and stimulative gaming interaction will take you into an immersive experience beyond the boundary of a movie.

In the game, you will experience three different stories. By solving lots of mind-twisting puzzles, you will explore the mystery and advance the plot.

Characteristics of the Game

1. Breaking the boundary between games and films, experience the new form of interactive movie game
2. The movie-grade picture quality and the changeful plot bring you an immersive experience
3. The extreme panoramic effect can be experienced without a VR device
4. The intense and stimulative live-action gaming interaction presents a strong sense of reality
5. The multi-episode suspense game presents a puzzling movie experience
6. The well-prepared puzzle games challenge the intelligence of players

Background of the Story

In the city of the country S, several weird and inter-mingled incidents have happened. There seem countless connections among the main characters of the incidents.

Conspiracy

The Heart

Sudden misfortune

Who is the backstage manipulator on earth, and has harmed all people for what purpose?

The plot is to be advanced by you

short_description: Memories is a suspense movie game of live-action escape room, which presents a multitude of mind-twisting missions. By solving the puzzles with the clue of the plot, players will explore the vein of the whole story and accomplish the missions with the progress of the game.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT210/AMD Radeon HD 4350
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT210/AMD Radeon HD 4350
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
